Description: The gold ring has a serpent's head at each end of the hoop, the heads turned back against their necks. Skin and details of the heads are crudely indicated by short strokes and cross-hatching.

Exhibitions.ExhTitle: Objects of Adornment: Five Thousand Years of Jewelry from the Walters Art Gallery, Baltimore
